nodes.text: Sandewar Mandewar was an alleged alien who was depicted by the notorious doctor and smuggler Cornelius Evazan, who was posing as a shapeshifter named "Lopset Yas" using a pluripleq, a rare bioengineered creature. While pretending to show off his shape-shifting abilities to the rogue archaeologist Chelli Aphra sometime between 0 ABY and 3 ABY, Evazan impersonated Mandewar, describing him as the leader of the Vex crusade before Aphra cut him off. Evazan's depiction of Mandewar had blue eyes, brown skin, and a nose with a darker hue.
Sandewar Mandewar appeared, through impersonation, in the comic Doctor Aphra 21, written by Si Spurrier, illustrated by Kev Walker, and published by Marvel Comics on June 27, 2018.
